original_text: The other things that happened while Ahab was king are written in a book. The book is called ‘The history of Israel's kings’. It tells about all the great things that he did. It also tells about the beautiful palace and the cities that he built.
korean_text: 아합의 남은 행적과 그가 행한 모든 일과 그가 건축한 상아궁과 그가 건축한 모든 성읍은 이스라엘 왕 역대지략에 기록되지 아니하였느냐

sentences.original_text: The other things that happened while Ahab was king
sentences.korean_translation: 아합이 왕으로 있을 때 일어난 다른 일들은

sentences.original_text: The book is called 'The history of Israel's kings'
It tells about all the great things that he did
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 그가 한 모든 위대한 일들을 이야기합니다

sentences.original_text: It also tells about the beautiful palace
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 또한 아름다운 궁전에 대해서도 이야기합니다

sentences.original_text: and the cities that he built
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 건축한 도시들에 대해서도 이야기합니다
